About Me

My name is Diego Rivera and I am from Sacramento, California. I am a current Full-Stack Software Engineer Student through the UC Davis Coding Bootcamp.

Work

Anime4You

Built With: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, jQuery

This was a group project where a three of us designed and developed a site that allows users to search popular anime or specific anime using Third Party APIs.The site also allows users to create their own watchlist that saves to local storage.
